samples.description: This is a sample that can load Samsung Avatar.
This is a sample that improves performance according to camera distance by applying Avatar's Material LOD.
This is a FaceTracking Sample that works on Android devices. There is a FaceTracking On/Off function and an Avatar application On/Off function.

This is a sample that can load an Avatar created in Galaxy using a fileprovider 
Please refer to README.md -> GettingAvatar Sample 
on https://github.com/Samsung/avatar-plugin-for-unity
This sample is a hair/accessory simulation sample scene.
